name: Book Catalog

features.title: Implement Redux-toolkit and RTK Query data fetching
Delete the book and show the toastify
Edit the book and show the toastify
Login user with email and password
Register new user with email and password
Review add authenticate user and show review particular book

description: I have developed a dynamic Book Catalog App using React, Redux, and TypeScript, demonstrating my proficiency in modern web development technologies. This app boasts a wide array of features, showcasing my expertise in creating robust, user-friendly applications. This project showcases my ability to create feature-rich web applications, ensuring an engaging user experience while adhering to best practices in web development. With an emphasis on user-friendly design and functionality, my Book Catalog App serves as a testament to my skills as a frontend developer

name: Pc_Builder_App

features.title: Implemented user authentication and registration system for secure user accounts.
Employed Next.js for optimized server-side rendering and a responsive user experience.
Created a dynamic PC customization feature, allowing authenticated users to build PCs according to their component preferences.

description: Developed a web-based PC builder application using Next.js, offering users the ability to create custom PCs and explore a wide range of computer components. The application features user registration and login, product search by category, and a seamless process for assembling a personalized PC by selecting CPU, monitor, RAM, speakers, and more.

name: Medical Care

name: Edulector Learning Palteform
description: Anyone can log in to this website with emai and password and google authentication. If the user logs in, he will be recommended to buy the products. Otherwise, it will be sent to the login page. The user can order the products, see all his order , delete his order products history if he wants.
